heading: Wednesday Night
text: Snow showers in far northern NY, a rising chance elsewhere north, mainly late.

heading: Thursday
text: Snow showers and squalls, spreading north to south.
temperature: Falling into the teens north, into the 20s south

heading: Friday
text: A mix of sun and clouds.
temperature: Valleys mainly upper teens to lower 20s

heading: Saturday
text: Chance of snow showers in the north after noon.
